website_summaries.verdict: Quickly creates long-lasting curls and has an impressive number of curling and safety features.
pros: Creates long-lasting curls in a snap
Lots of options for different types of curls and a tank that holds enough water for many uses
We love the safety feature that stops the motor and automatically reverses if too much hair is inserted
cons: There is a learning curve, as with any auto curler — and this is one of the priciest on the market

website_summaries.verdict: The best professional curl machine that makes it easy to get high-level results quickly.
pros: Comes with a built-in steamer and sprayer to apply steam to enhance curling
Heating element works quickly as it glides down thin strands of hair
cons: Steamer can only use distilled water to work properly
Tap water will not work correctly

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: Read instructions carefully. My hair got caught in the device and would not release. Started to smell my hair burning so got scissors and cut it out. Very sad!
customer_reviews.author: Clara Beth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing curling iron.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing curling iron I have ever bought in my life. I was so amazed, the first time I tried on my daughter's hair. Her hair is completely straight and it won't curl for nothing. I got the babylissPro and curled her in like 20 minutes. I was shocked of how nice her hair looked. Is worth paying the 140.
customer_reviews.author: Migg

customer_reviews.title: Should have listened to the warnings from others.
customer_reviews.text: Clearly received a counterfeit item. I'm sending it back before I even bother using it.
customer_reviews.author: Adaky

customer_reviews.title: So easy, great results!
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly easy to use (never tried the steam option) but i put on mid setting for all and my hair is fabulous
customer_reviews.author: Wendy A. Von Fries

customer_reviews.title: If Russian roulette with your hair sounds like a fun game, buy this!
customer_reviews.text: If you love the smell of burnt, smokey hair and you just can’t get into your hairdresser fast enough for bangs....just use this :) My first curl came out fairly nice looking, my second curl turned into an unwanted side bang because my hair got trapped, wouldn’t come out, stayed in until it burnt off. Even if 99 percent of the time I could achieve fast curls, I wouldn’t risk the 1 percent chance of literally burning a chunk of hair off my head....would you?
customer_reviews.author: Callie Rowell

customer_reviews.title: Buying a 2nd One (first one bought in 2015)
customer_reviews.text: This machine lasted a good solid 2 years. It started to pull hair a little more, as it aged, and would be moodier with having to put less hair in for it to work. Then I switched to another curling machine that took less time (as it took more hair) and used that for a few years. I found this one is a box and decided to give it a try again. I had forgotten how great it was. THE STEAM FEATURE IS WHERE IT IS AT!!! My curls last 2 full days. Since my first one, after years of regular use, is not as epic as it cold be I am buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Perry

customer_reviews.title: ... time my wife used it and the results were nice. The second time she tried to use it ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked the first time my wife used it and the results were nice. The second time she tried to use it the motor was having issues completing its cycle and I was worried it would seize up with her hair being baked inside it, luckily when the motor failed it was at the beginning of the cycle and we didn't have to deal with how to get her hair out of this gizmo. I was skeptical about this thing from other reviews but gave it a shot anyway, now I wish I wouldn't have.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M. Macdermott

customer_reviews.title: wasnt good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really like this curler, for the 129 dollars I paid my 19 dollar curling iron from Walmart worked better, you could only take little small pieces at a time the curl really didn't come out that good , and you had to be careful cause your hair would get tangled inside if you went to close or took to much hair, It took me so long to curl my hair You could only do the tiny pieces, I wanted to return it but the box got thrown away, so I was stuck with it , only used it once , and am using my curling iron from Walmart 19.00 dollars it works better!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Calcagni

customer_reviews.title: Very Very Happy from someone with straight fine hair who wanted some body!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! I was so hesitant because of cost and the worry I'd get my hair caught and burnt in it. I used it for the first time, without any styling product in my hair, and wow!! I love it. Not one tangle, not one bit of worry, I love the steam because it's healthier for your hair then pure dry heat and man dies it hold curl longer. The pics I posted are after I brushed out the curls a bit to blend them. I can't wait to try this with a dab of mouse for even more definition of curls.
customer_reviews.author: DistraughtDragon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Curls That Last DAYS!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several months ago and ALWAYS get questions about this machine. It's fantastic. The steam makes the curls last two or three days. I use it on my long (lower back) thick wavy hair, and on both of my daughters (both have fine hair) The secret is SMALL pieces of hair. Too large and you won't get good curls. I recommend this is EVERYONE, but again, use SMALL pieces of hair for best results! If you are worried about fake items you can call BabyLiss and give them the serial number from the unit. Mine was authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Fabulous

customer_reviews.title: Recommend If You Don’t Like to Do Your Own Hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have used it one time and so far, so good. Due to covid19, I haven’t been able to see a stylist. I have to officiate a wedding today, and this little product got here just in time. Took about 20 minutes to get my hair from flat iron straight (I smoothed out my naturally curly hair as the instructions said your hair must be straight to use) to volume and some waves. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Curls are a little tight, but I still love this tool!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this curler. My friend let me use hers and I immediately bought one for myself. It's a miracle tool! My only wish is that there could be a looser curl option. My hair is naturally curly and even the loose curl options (according to the instruction manual) actually makes my curls tighter than my natural curl. However, if I straighten my hair and then wait a day to use this tool, the curls relax a bit. Not as much as I'd normally want, but I'm still happy to have a curling tool that doesn't burn my fingers/hair and only takes 15 minutes to style my entire mane!
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: It was a few weeks before I used the product twice on my hair. My hair was healthy before use. I realized after the second use, that the water wasn't going down and realized the steamer wasn't working. After use my hair started feeling really dry and gritty and was breaking off. I have bleached hair, however the ends were horribly dry and brittle. I would like to return this product knowing what I know now.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Redwanc

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing. I have LOTS of hair
customer_reviews.text: I can't hair. I can't even pencil in my eyebrows. This thing is amazing. I have LOTS of hair. It's twice as dense per square inch than most people. (My hairdresser is in awe.) This only took me 35 minutes. I used Big Sexy products afterwards to get the final result. **I did get a tangle, but if you react quickly, it lets you gently pull it out, but you only have 1 second before it gets really wound up. Don't overload it, carefully brush out each strand and section off using clips and you shouldn't have any problems. If you have strays hairs that are causing the section to spread out, you're going to have problems. Less is more!
customer_reviews.author: u/IDoMindTheDudeMinds

customer_reviews.title: The best tool ever
customer_reviews.text: It is the most amazing tool I have bought for styling my hair. Since I purchased this, 8 of my friends that have tried it, have also bought it. It will not damage your hear as long as you follow the instructions. Start with dry and knot free hair, keep a comb handy to ensure the small sections are knot free, and hold the machine in the right direction ( roles towards your head, tank on the outside direction). Perfect results every time. My curls loosen up but hold a whole week. I have used this tool for over a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Manjola Prifti

customer_reviews.title: We were so disappointed. It barely curled her hair
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give this ZERO stars. I paid a lot for this to get the name brand curler. Gave it to my daughter for her birthday. We were so disappointed. It barely curled her hair. A curling iron did it faster and so much better. Then, disaster!! It ate her hair. A huge, tangled mess. It took a lot of work to get her hair free. Not worth the risk of her hair getting burnt or stuck in the curler. Getting a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Paragon Partners

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: By far this is the best curler I have ever owed. With all of the others autocurlers I could not come close to the roots. And this one comes really close and curls are beautifull and stay in tact for at least 5 days. Love it! The negative side it is very heavy and my hands are getting tired in about 20 minutes. I have long hair and it take me about 45-50 minutes to style. Also it is not dual voltage and I can not travel with it. I only tried steam feature twice and did not notice much difference on my hair with or without it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Not even so so
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like this much at all. Returned it. The steam was too much for my scalp. Steam is an optional setting, but since the curls were only so so and didn't last but one day I thought the steam would help. I have thick hair, with body just below my chin. I opted for a less expensive model by another company. Very happy with the Conair.
customer_reviews.author: Your Texas Friend

customer_reviews.title: New favorite curling device!
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed. I was hesitant to order this, because of the price, but now that I have it, I’m sold. Easy to use, although you do have to pay attention to directions and how-to videos. Never burned my fingers at all, which is what usually happens with curling wands and tongs. No issues with tangles. The curls have real longevity, too. My hair curls easily, but doesn’t usually hold the curl very long, but with this device, I’m on the second day, and still loving the look, even after brushing through the curls. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: TANGLED MY DAUGHTER'S HAIR
customer_reviews.text: after 5 minutes of usage, my daughter's hair became severely tangled in this styling tool. I had to literally rip her hair out of it. the hair which was stuck inside is now damaged and burnt as is my hand which sustained a burn when trying to release her hair. please be cautious; this is a dangerous product.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger White

customer_reviews.title: I have thin hair and curling irons are better for straightening my hair than curling as my hair ...
customer_reviews.text: My secret weapon! I have thin hair and curling irons are better for straightening my hair than curling as my hair never holds the curl...UNTIL this Babyliss beauty right here. My hair holds the curl for 2 days!!! While day #2, is a relaxed curl/wave, it still looks great! The results are incredible and my hair is healthy, no damage. Because my hair is thin, I use the minimum heat and time. That's how amazing this curler is. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work that easy,the way it shows in video. It takes way more time then what it shows. Little extra hair will stuck your hair in machine. Very disappointed with the product. I prefer to curl with straitener machine which is lot more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product but it fell short... in short it would take me 2-3times longer to curl my hair with this and the curls it creates aren’t my style. You can only put 1 inch sections in at a time which means you have to do later upon layer and the curls are tight ringlets leaving you with 90’s style curls. If that’s your goal and you don’t have a lot of hair then I guess it will work- otherwise stick with a regular curling iron or wand
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEY C.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!! Do not second guess yourself- get it!
customer_reviews.text: My hair WILL NOT HOLD A CURL. I tried a friends and it held it with no product for TWO DAYS. I immediately bought one and love how easy it is to use and how quickly it curls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This machine works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Worried about whether this is an counterfeit item, I did some research and realize it is not. This machine works like a dream, has lots of settings. The print describing the settings is very small, hard to read. Works with or without steam. Easy to pack when traveling. Heats up quickly. Requires a bit of practice at first but I can curl all of my hair in less than 10 minutes (relatively thick, just below shoulder length). Update after using for 4 months - this machine is wonderful, works like a charm. I use it with steam or without.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Took me a few tries to learn how to use this but now I can curl my hair in 15m. Just dont leave your hair in for more than the count of 3 or it will burn and splinter your hair. I count to 2 and then take my hair out.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Cinquegrana

customer_reviews.title: My hair got stucked into the curl machine :-(
customer_reviews.text: I read the instruction carefully before I used it. The first two tries were fine. However, my hair got stucked into the curl machine and I couldn't get my hair out. Unfortunately I had to cut my hair. As you could see, my hair is still inside it and I couldn't even get my hair out before I return the curl machine.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Curls are fantastic and with little effort.
customer_reviews.text: I loved, not liked the quick and long lasting curl. I did not like the hair getting tangled. While this is totally avoidable if one insures the strand is completely in the curling channel, there was nothing mentioned in the packaging. We're it not for that, I would have given the product five stars. The product is fantastic because it cuts the curling time drastically. TIP: Part hair in the back and bring forward when curling. While not necessary - when I was unable to see the curling channel, I got tangled which almost made me give up.
customer_reviews.author: AHAL

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: After reading numerous revies claiming that this is a counterfit i got a little nervous. I took a deemed original product bought in the local store from one of my relatives and painstakengly went throught the smallest details. There were sime differences but theirs was another model without water but there was nothing proving that my item was worse. Now adter half a year of use my wife claims that is the second best thing after peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Carlo

customer_reviews.title: SCRATCHES AND DINGS ON NEW ITEMS?
customer_reviews.text: I just received the curler through the mail it was a gift to my girlfriend. It came all scratched and dinged up. I'm very unhappy and I haven't even turned it on yet.
customer_reviews.author: Nhan D Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: If this creates curls like the videos and pics
customer_reviews.text: Uh. Fail. If this creates curls like the videos and pics, I'd be shocked. We laughed for a while trying to get this to work well and it never really performed no matter how closely we tried to use the instructions. Based on the reviews, mostly people are figuring it out, but for the cost we were expecting more. We returned it after a few weeks and several attempts.
customer_reviews.author: GLo

customer_reviews.title: Too much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot stop showing people this new toy! I love that I can choose which direction the curl goes. I love that it has steam and can be on or off. I love how fast I get my hair done versus the endless hours of long hair torture I was used to and didn't bother half the time. Downfall would be the size of the curl never changes and for shorter hair than the chin, why bother having it because it doesn't do flips or wide waves. I love it for my long hair!
customer_reviews.author: Malaria

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product. This is the second one I have had - the first was another brand and the motor in it only lasted about 6 months. But when I got this one, I noticed how much smoother and better it operates and also smoothes out my hair. It heats up well, and I only use it on the lowest heat setting. You can adjust the heat setting, the length of time it holds the curl inside, and the direction of the curl (I always leave mine on alternating curls). Can't recommend this enough!
customer_reviews.author: T. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest tool since - since - since - let's see - hair dryers!!! I mean it. Very easy to use, and I have terrible arthritis in my hands and shoulders. I love it. Sturdy and well made with metal, not plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: I have taken this to work because everyone loves the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have taken this to work because everyone loves the curl I get with this tool. I have very thick, long, frizzy hair. This gives me smooth waves that will last for 2-3 days or tighter spiral curls. The steam action makes all the difference in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super curls
customer_reviews.text: I own a truckload of curling irons, flat irons, curling brushes, curlers, you name it. Mehhh.. But THIS baby works. Just follow instructions, spray a whiff of hairspray and shake it! three days of bounce.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa V.

customer_reviews.title: Lasting Bouncy No-Frizz Curls
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my hair which has some damage so I use the lowest setting with steam. Takes getting used to using small sections of hair and learning to use the tool properly without tangling, its different than regular curling irons or rollers in the perpendicular angle to the scalp. Otherwise, the curls take under a minute for healthy hair. Overall, it does take longer than a traditional iron but the results are worth it. Healthy lasting bouncy curls which no curling iron has ever produced.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Check the product and know that is work
customer_reviews.text: The first time work really good and I'm so happy with my babylisspro but in the 2 time when I'm tried to used .if started to stop for a while. I just waiting for 10 o 20 minutes for started again and again..I was so frustrated and had to return it..
customer_reviews.author: Vidamia135

customer_reviews.title: Great curls and Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this product and I was quick to buy. I have all Babyliss products and was not disappointed in this one. No more burning my fingers trying to use the wand. Gave me great curls and beach waves.
customer_reviews.author: BB1857

customer_reviews.title: Crappy
customer_reviews.text: Burnt my hair and hair got stuck and super damaged. Outer barrel got so hot and burnt my counter.
customer_reviews.author: R Berk

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, love it, love it. Once I do my hair stays until next shampoo. I have very long and heavy hair. Have been using it for over 6 months and every time I do, I receive numerous compliments. First couple of times I used my hair got caught and took me minute to untangle.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Sotirova

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my better half and this thing runs like a charm and she loves it. It's pretty crazy to have her get ready in half the time and coming out with so many curls. For her its about a 2 sec wind up and a beep, release, and repeat. It did catch her hair once or twice but it was very easy to untangle and it didn't pull any hair out in the process. Light and easy to hold, she's had it for 4+ months with no issues and doesn't burn herself at all like the other hair irons she's had over the years. A great gift that she didn't even know she needed.
customer_reviews.author: RiverStyx

customer_reviews.title: It may have been user error but I could not ...
customer_reviews.text: It may have been user error but I could not make anything happen with this iron. I read the directions and tried on three occasions to get a curl. No beep. No motion. No anything. The directions stated that your hair had to be in a specific condition, specifically sized to work. I tried everything I could with no result. The iron seemed hot on the inside but it did not grab hair as described. Might have been lovely but I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: RhFactor

customer_reviews.title: Cannot live without this ever again!
customer_reviews.text: I am in the process of growing my hair from very short back to long hair, now you girls know how awful your hair can look in between growing out. My daughter had one of these and she let me borrow it and all I can say is that I could not order one fast Enough! My hair is about shoulderlength now and I get so many compliments when I spend 20 minutes curling my hair then I flip my hair over and ruffle it up with my fingers then I flip it back up and style it with my fingers and hairspray. It's the styled messy sexy look and it looks absolutely wonderful. Thank you Miracurl !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevyn

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter are obsessed with this product. A little pricey but they are making great use of it. Curls stay in all day!
customer_reviews.author: IroseN13

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use! My hair is black Asian straight style by nature, and pretty hard to curl. With this machine it can last at least a day or two. Sometimes there's smoke if heated for too long. I'm yet to try the steam function which may help.
customer_reviews.author: XS

customer_reviews.title: Love this curling machine!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who has medium length, fine, straight hair. We were frustrated with the curling wand (have to wear gloves or get burned) and it took a long to curl the whole head of hair. We were amazed how great this worked and produced perfect curls in a much shorter amount of time. It does the work for you!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen K

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used a curling iron my entire life, and this was the worst. The curls were horrible, and it kept getting stuck in my hair. Save your time and money, and buy a regular curling iron.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: I love my new curls!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I am one of those unfortunate souls who can't curl my hair with a curling iron unless I want kinks and really bad curls that fall out with in a hour. With this curler my world has changed and the curls last for hours upon hours (16 at least). I have gotten my hair stuck 3 times but it easily came out. It takes me about 10 minutes to curl my hair so jot long at all (for me anyway). It is really easy to use and makes wonderful curls. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: d.Davila

customer_reviews.title: Babyliss Pro
customer_reviews.text: A. Now I have no hair to curl. B. It's very heavy and awkward to use. It would have taken way too much time to curl. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline T Karel

customer_reviews.title: LOVED IT but it BROKE
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give it more stars because it deserves it as far as a product. I LOVE how it curls my hair!!!! Mine broke, however, not too long after I got it. My friend has had hers for years and it’s still going strong. Maybe it was an anomaly because when it DID work the curls were amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: If the price is too good to be true, IT IS!! I was sold a counterfeit.
customer_reviews.author: macgirl

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised - bravo!
customer_reviews.text: This tool works as advertised! It does take some getting used to, to get your positioning right and the amount of hair you can do at a time. Once you have it down though, it goes quickly. Waves hold in my very fine and thin hair for 3 days. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: PenguinMama

customer_reviews.title: I have tried other curlers like this and they did not work
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other curlers like this and they did not work. This one works great! The only thing I don't like about it is you can not put much hair in it at one time. Also, I did not see instructions for what to do if your hair gets tangled in it! You have to be very careful to point it the right way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: this had hair in it! someone used it and theysent it out to me..Yuck!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprise - it works
customer_reviews.text: This is actually one of those products that works. It holds a curl on my hair for 2 days. My hair NEVER held curl before. Don't think about it - just buy this is you're looking for a curler
customer_reviews.author: Schlink

customer_reviews.title: Let’s your hair super dey en sensitive
customer_reviews.text: The curls are beautiful and long lasting but after you washed your hair you may do a hydration treatment because gets very dry even in natural hair.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Returned - not for my hair - but still a great tool.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a neat tool and worked perfectly the four times I used it. My problem is that my hair was taking the curl too well. At the lowest temp, and the lowest time, I still ended up with super tight/springy curls (wanted much looser curls). So, I returned it. I can see folks having lots of fun with it!
customer_reviews.author: Megan S

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t recommend for fine hair. We followed the instructions but my daughter’s fine hair gets tangled in it. Wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Casey R. Barr

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this hair tool. I have very thick, long hair. It did take me an hour to curl all my hair, however, the curl has lasted for days. I have used large hot rollers for years and the curl always fell out after a few hours because my hair is so heavy. My hot rollers are being retired. This will be my go to hair tool from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Hbm47

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you struggle with straight hair and at your wits end with nothing else to do. If you are looking for something easy to style your hair. This is the product you're looking for!! I have fine hair that doesn't ever want to do much. This really gives my hair body.
customer_reviews.author: HEATHER BARKER

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use - Great results
customer_reviews.text: Arrived this afternoon. I read the instructions and went to town. I am a happy girl. I’m hair styling challenged... For me to say it’s easy to use that’s high praise! Nice soft curls... fast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product works great. I’m a stylist the price on amazon was less that at the supply house
customer_reviews.author: janet zachry

customer_reviews.title: ... it 5 Stars because I think it would be great for someone with shorter hair but for me
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 Stars because I think it would be great for someone with shorter hair but for me, with long, thick hair, it's a timely process. I don't have that much time and I can't justify paying this kind of money for a product I would use seldom for a special event. I will stick with my barrel curler. But, again, it is neat product for someone with shorter hair, and more patience than me :)
customer_reviews.author: Angiego

customer_reviews.title: I love this hair styling tool
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair styling tool. It is very easy to use and I get much better results than with a curling iron. I have used both the loose curl setting, medium curl, and tight curl and each works well just with a different look. I tried this on my niece who has very thin fine hair and it did not work well.
customer_reviews.author: P. A. Conn

customer_reviews.title: Not good for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: It does the curl. But doesn’t last long. And pulls a lot your hair. Many times my hair will get stock in the machine. I have fine hair. I don’t know if mine was fake or not. Hopefully not.
customer_reviews.author: joanna rangel david

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It is quit easy to use it. I will totally keep it!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great but I am just not coordinated for these hair ...
customer_reviews.text: Great but I am just not coordinated for these hair stuff. I get one side good and the other side is always a mess!
customer_reviews.author: rksoko

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this and her curls look great! However when I use it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this and her curls look great! However when I use it, I get my hair caught in it and it almost burns off. Scary!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Kent

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Tried it out and found it was very easy. Others complained about hair getting tangled. My hair is natural and about shoulder length and it worked great. No tangles, cute curls. Just need to play around with it a bit re tight vs loose curls. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MoTown

customer_reviews.title: Curling my hair has never been this easy
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool. I curl all of my hair practically in minutes and almost one handed. High quality products. I have an 8 year old blow dry and flat iron by the same manufacturer and they both function like new. I have showed several people how to use and they have purchased as well.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Demaree

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Very intuitive to use! Love the product. Jams are easy to clear and are very seldom. Curled my wife's entire head in about 12-15 minutes whereas before took about an hour with a regular curling iron. Heat is easily regulated and the steam function helps hold the hair curled for a much longer time period! If you get the original Babyliss product and not the cheap knock-off then you will be very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Vyacheslav M Velet

customer_reviews.title: love it, my curl holds without any hairspray in ...
customer_reviews.text: love it , my curl holds without any hairspray in the humid South, have long hair over half way down back , very thick and wavy. Recommend not to use any hair product prior to curling . hair has gotten stuck when doing back of head but only due to me not holding curler at right angle.
customer_reviews.author: Product buyer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the way this works. It curls exactly as advertised & is easy to use also!!
customer_reviews.author: bigd

customer_reviews.title: Curls all day
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I got mine from "BeautyAnd" and it's the real thing. FYI - the directions say to use distilled water for the steam so have some on hand, I had to run out to the store! My curls stay all day. I used to use Caruso and my curls did not stay like this!
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I have curly
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I have curly, fine, thin and frizzy prone hair and I use this once every 3 days for great curls.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Garnett

customer_reviews.title: Love the steam
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations! Love the steam, it lasts so you don't have to keep refilling, and not only does it curl my impossible to curl hair, it stays that way. Fun to use all the different style curls and it's EASY to do. Glad I added this to my hair tools 😊
customer_reviews.author: C. Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the $
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before making this purchase. This definitely met my expectations and then some. My hair is thick and wavy and can never hold a curl. After a few hours they would be flat. After using this my curls lasted all day with no hair spray or anything. even after brushing my hair before bed I was amazed that my hair still had a ton of curl!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: No damage
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. Won’t burn or damage your hair
customer_reviews.author: Nar

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: Wow Donny girls love BaBylosspro, the curls stay together all day sometimes even 2 days! And it’s cheaper on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt use any other curling product
customer_reviews.text: I always hated curling my hair. Curls never stayed in and they always looked weird. This product has saved me my nerves and time. Yes, its heavy...but what do you expect from ssomething with a motor?! In my opinion, its fast and very easy to use. It keeps curls in and they stay all day!
customer_reviews.author: Latesha

customer_reviews.title: love this my hair is very very naturally straight doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: love this my hair is very very naturally straight doesn't hold curl well this makes the curl last for about 3-4 days
customer_reviews.author: sandra hassell

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This curler broke down after 3 months of occasional use! So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: zp4

customer_reviews.title: I have very fine hair and its right above my shoulders
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine hair and its right above my shoulders. I use it on the lowest setting and I get a nice loose curl that makes my hair look so much fuller and thicker. It lasts all day long. So far I have not used the steam. Love it! Glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Great product works as stated
customer_reviews.text: I was weary about buying this product due to all the reviews of getting counterfeit units we verified ours was the real thing I love this product works great no issues at all
customer_reviews.author: Fair and balanced

customer_reviews.title: Great curls!
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as promised and is very quick. I never curl my hair because it's fine and I would spend time rolling or using a curling iron only to have it fall within the hour. These curls hold well in my hair and I am very pleased. Read and follow the directions carefully and you will love your curls!
customer_reviews.author: Diane English

customer_reviews.title: Best curling iron!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS CURLING IRON!!! The curls stay so long, even after sleeping on it for a couple days!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Molina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great product once I figured out how to hold it correctly, curls stay in all day, without any hairstyling products and me and my daughter have fine straight hair.
customer_reviews.author: Megan J Rau

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift. Extremely disapointed. Does not works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: oscar miranda

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny! I cannot curl my own hair ...
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! I cannot curl my own hair to save my life- not only do I constantly burn myself, my hair does not hold the curl well. This curling contraption is perfection! I curled my own hair in about 20 minutes on the first try, and it stayed curled through the entire day!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Curls...finally!
customer_reviews.text: My straight hair NEVER held a curl...until Babyliss! The curl holds all day, and I wake the next day with gentle waves. I found I do need to intensely condition more often which is probably a good thing anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Treva

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: I love how simple it is to use. I have not had any issues using my Babyliss. I love it and use it often.
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very efficient and easy to use for someone like me who never knows how to use a curling iron.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaowei chen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: If I could put zero stars I would. This was a very expensive failure. Tried it on several friends with different hair types. Didn’t curl any of them. Unfortunately I missed my return deadline and am stuck with this rotten tomato don’t buy! You
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Ortega

customer_reviews.title: great curling iron!
customer_reviews.text: got it for hair extensions, curls them beautifully, alternating the curls, haven't had any damage to my hair, although I use a hot iron product to protect it.
customer_reviews.author: leanne

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. Watch to make sure you get the real deal. My hair is thick and usually doesn't hold curl. It does so well with this device. Easy to use! Easier to use on short hair but works great on long. I've gotten three other people to buy this just because they used mine...and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for almost two years and it makes great smooth curls for long hair. It takes a little getting used to on how to use it, but once you get the hang of it, It's not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product that foes what it says
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! It is so easy to use! Took me a week or so to really get the feel and learn the settings appropriate for my hair. The vurl lasts all day and really guves body to my long but thin hair. LOVE IT! Would buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: DrakeGrad

customer_reviews.title: 5 star!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! I like it very much. My straight hair became curly at last. So easy and fast!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Curls stay in. Almost never tangles hair.
customer_reviews.author: captkirkt

product_meta.title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Professional Curl Machine
product_meta.description:
Style:Miracurl Steamtech ProThe BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium MiraCurl SteamTech Professional Curl Machine forms one perfect curl after another. The Nano titanium curl chamber delivers ultra-smooth, high-definition, shinier curls. Featuring 4 timer settings & 3-direction curl control - so you can create a variety of uniform or free-flowing curls. With 3 heat settings: 450F, 410F, 375F - the MiraCurl SteamTech Professional Curl Machine is great for all types of hair. The SteamTech MiraCurl has an optional steam function which provides higher curl definition, better curl formation, & a longer hold time.

BRAND STORY
BaBylissPRO is the world’s leading producer of innovative, high-performance professional styling tools. Chosen by hairdressers, barbers, and clients everywhere, BabylissPRO styling tools are versatile and engineered to last.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
